headline: 2 Urgent Sells And 2 No Brainer Dividend Buys
summary: It is in our best approach to sell high and buy low. Here's how to approach it systematically today with 2 SELLS and 2 BUYS. Read the full article here.

headline: FERC rejects AEP request to sell capacity in upcoming auction
summary: Critics argued AEP utilities were trying to offload capacity they acquired to serve data centers that didn’t materialize. FERC appeared to echo that rationale, saying AEP’s “problem” is simply excess capacity resulting from “its own business decisions.”
